survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Kitchen Appliances Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, usage patterns, and satisfaction levels with smart kitchen appliances to guide product development and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Ensure the 'None of the above' option is clearly visible.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart kitchen appliance(s)?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Include 'N/A' for respondents who skipped Q1 or selected 'None of the above'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Display logic: Only show if Q1 has at least one selection other than 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart kitchen appliance(s)?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you purchased a smart kitchen appliance?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an open-text follow-up for 'Other'. Display logic: Same as Q2.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you purchased a smart kitchen appliance?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not select 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: Which features are most important to you when considering a smart kitchen appliance? (Rank top 3)
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices
questions.client_notes: Use a drag-and-drop ranking interface. Limit selections to 3.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: RANKING (limit to 3). Randomize option order.

script.question_text: Which features are most important to you when considering a smart kitchen appliance? (Rank top 3)
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about using smart kitchen appliances? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about using smart kitchen appliances? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to purchase another smart kitchen appliance in the next 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How likely are you to purchase another smart kitchen appliance in the next 12 months?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future smart kitchen appliances?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT (text area with character limit).

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in future smart kitchen appliances?
